Package webcommunication.webservice

Class SpeedConnectionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • webcommunication.webservice.SpeedConnectionManager
  • public class SpeedConnectionManager
extends Object
    Class responsible for managing the life cycle of a game of spe_ed on a given server. Done by connecting a SpeedWebSocket to a SpeedWebSocketClient.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private TimeSynchronizationManager timeSynchronizationManager  
      private WebserviceConnectionURI webserviceConnectionURI  

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      SpeedConnectionManager​(WebserviceConnectionURI webserviceConnectionURI, URI timeApiUri)
      Creates a new SpeedConnectionManager with a given WebserviceConnectionURI containing the URI of the server to play spe_ed on.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpeedConnectionManager

        public SpeedConnectionManager​(WebserviceConnectionURI webserviceConnectionURI,
                              URI timeApiUri)
        Creates a new SpeedConnectionManager with a given WebserviceConnectionURI containing the URI of the server to play spe_ed on.
        Parameters:
        webserviceConnectionURI - of the spe_ed server
        timeApiUri - URI of the API for the spe_ed_server time

    • Method Detail

      • play

        public void play​(Function<GameStep,​PlayerAction> gameStepHandler)
          throws ConnectionInitializationException,
                 ConnectionTerminationException,
                 InterruptedException
        Blocking method, which plays a single game of spe_ed on a server. The given Function must handle a single GameStep by processing its contents and returning a PlayerAction.
        Parameters:
        gameStepHandler - Function to handle a GameStep by processing its contents and returning a PlayerAction
        Throws:
        ConnectionInitializationException - thrown when the connection to the server could not be initialized
        ConnectionTerminationException - thrown when the connection to the server could not be terminated as planned
        InterruptedException - thrown when the await for the server closure was interrupted
